stage.name: GIVEN
stage.narrative:
GIVEN I have the AD Auth feature toggle turned on <add key="FeatureToggle.ActiveDirectoryLoginToggle" value="true" />
And I have the External Auth feature toogle turned on <add key="FeatureToggle.ExternalProviderLoginToggle" value="true" />

stage.name: WHEN/ THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I go to System > Security > Sign-on settings
THEN both the External Auth and AD Auth options appear

stage.name: WHEN/THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I set AD Auth to TRUE
AND I set External Auth to FALSE
THEN I should be able to select the Apply Button without Error

stage.name: WHEN/THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I set External Auth to be on
AND leave the External Auth URL blank
AND I click on the Apply Button
THEN I should receive an error

stage.name: WHEN/THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I set External Auth to be on
AND I enter an invalid URL
AND I click the Apply Button
THEN I will receive an error

stage.name: WHEN/THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I set External Auth to be on
AND I enter a URL that uses HTTP instead of HTTPS
AND I click the Apply Button
THEN I get an error

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Fail On Error
input.narrative: Flag indicating if an exception should be raised if an error message is detected. Default is False

output.name: Error Message
output.narrative: The error message, if there was an error

output.name: Detail
output.narrative: The detail, if there was an error

exception.detail: "Test Failed due to an unexpected error"

stage.name: Error Message Expected
stage.initialvalue: Please enter an authentication server URL.

resource.action: Sign-on Settings - Write Auth Server URL
Sign-on Settings - Write Auth Server URL

stage.name: Error Message Expected
stage.initialvalue: Authentication server URL must be secured over HTTPS.

stage.name: WHEN/THEN
stage.narrative:
WHEN I set External Auth to be on
AND I enter a URL that uses HTTPS
AND I click the Apply Button
THEN I won't receive an error message

resource.action: Sign-on Settings - Write Auth Server URL

stage.name: Error Message Expected
stage.initialvalue: Authentication server URL is not a valid format e.g. https://domain.

exception.detail: "Test Failed, as error message did not match the expected error"
"Test Failed due to error message not matching the expected value"
"Test Failed as error message did not match the expected value"

output.name: Auth Server Value
output.narrative: Value of the Auth Server URL text box

exception.detail: "Test failed due to Host Type not being equal to the Auth Server URL value"

resource.action: Sign-on Settings - Write Auth Server URL
